QZX4BA.en:
[Shone]
Wait! You can see me?
Oh well, I haven't yet mastered my skills. Though, you seem too weak to help me.
Come back when you are stronger.
QZX4BA.pt:
[Shone]
Wait! You can see me?
Oh well, I haven't yet mastered my skills. Though, you seem too weak to help me.
Come back when you are stronger.

[Shone]
Wait! You can see me?
Oh well, I haven't yet mastered my skills.
QpX4BA.pt:
[Shone]

Q5X4BA.en:
[Shone]
Hey do you think you can help me? I am trying to discover the secret of how the Hode monsters hide.
I will reward you if you help.
Q5X4BA.pt:
[Shone]
Hey do you think you can help me? I am trying to discover the secret of how the Hode monsters hide.
I will reward you if you help.

RpX4BA.en:
[Shone]
Thank you so much!
How many would you like to help me hunt?
RpX4BA.pt:
[Shone]
Thank you so much!
How many would you like to help me hunt?

SpX4BA.en:
[Shone]
Come back to me after hunting 50 Hodes and let me know what you find out.
SpX4BA.pt:
[Shone]
Come back to me after hunting 50 Hodes and let me know what you find out.

VZX4BA.en:
[Shone]
Are you sure that you want to stop hunting?
Any progress that you've made will be erased.
VZX4BA.pt:
[Shone]
Are you sure that you want to stop hunting?
Any progress that you've made will be erased.

VpX4BA.en:
[Shone]
Ok, well come back if you change your mind.

[Shone]

V5X4BA.en:
[Shone]
Thank you kind adventurer.
Hmm... so that's how they do it eh? Time for more training.
